page.title: 18Entertainments in Bramdean
page.content: The most accessible entertainment in Bramdean is the appreciation of the countryside itself. Within yards of every home there is a country walk with access to flora and fauna, and scenery of outstanding beauty. Most homes own a T.V. and other home entertainments such as radio and music centres; pianos and computers are more limited. Another innovation is the video recorder. Hobbies such as gardening, knitting, sewing, painting, photography and etc., are naturally important in area where more organised entertainments are limited. There is a public house in the village. There is a Women's Institute, Over 60's club, bingo club and youth club. The village hall hosts discos and barbecues. The nearest cinema, theatre and swimming pool is 9 miles.
